pr_title: Add an option to sort equipments in IIDM XML export

timeline.message:
Add an option to sort equipments in IIDM XML export

Signed-off-by: Geoffroy Jamgotchian <geoffroy.jamgotchian@rte-france.com>

timeline.bodyText: Don't know if we should change the signature of this deprecated method? I think we can either delete it directly or not change it and make it call writeCurrentLimits(index, limits, writer, IidmXmlConstants.CURRENT_IIDM_XML_VERSION, new ExportOptions());
timeline.author: MioRtia

replies.bodyText:
Deprecation has been put end of January (so 3.1?) so maybe the best solution is to to remove it? Using new ExportOptions() would be very confusing as we could end up using this deprecated method as partially sorted file (but we are not suppose to start using a deprecated method).
As you want.
replies.author: geofjamg

replies.bodyText: In this case, I think we can remove the deprecated methods, it will be cleaner.
replies.author: miovd

timeline.author: MioRtia

timeline.bodyText: Should we keep the previous signature writeCurrentLimits(Integer, CurrentLimits, XMLStreamWriter, IidmXmlVersion) as deprecated? It can be used in extensions outside iidm-xml-converter)
timeline.author: MioRtia

replies.bodyText: Ok I will keep it for backward compat.
replies.author: geofjamg

timeline.author: MioRtia

timeline.bodyText: Maybe add some javadoc? It is rather intuitive but I'd rather have public util methods well documentated here (particularly specifying by what are the extensions sorted, here by their names).
timeline.author: MioRtia

replies.bodyText: I can just globally document the sorted option in ExportOptions (so describe the sorting key for each of the xml element) ?
replies.author: geofjamg

timeline.author: MioRtia
MioRtia
MioRtia
MioRtia
MioRtia

timeline.message:
Add missing deprecated

Signed-off-by: Geoffroy Jamgotchian <geoffroy.jamgotchian@rte-france.com>
